text: Pa we wuj riꞌ kintzꞌibꞌaj chiꞌwe chi man kuya taj kixkꞌojiꞌ kukꞌ we winaq ri kakibꞌij chi e kojonelabꞌ kꞌa te riꞌ kakibꞌan taq mak kukꞌ achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ixoqibꞌ, keꞌkiqꞌijilaꞌj e bꞌanom taq tyox, e bꞌanal taq tzij, e qꞌabꞌarelabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kakeleqꞌaj pwaq chike nikꞌaj chik, mixwaꞌ kukꞌ we winaq riꞌ.
